Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces joined) of the body of a pale red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section with many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of four lines of black-painted Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393868) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393868)
